metadata.title: CVE-2020-14039 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Go before 1.13.13 and 1.14.x before 1.14.5, Certificate.Verify may lacka check on the VerifyOptions.KeyUsages EKU requirements (ifVerifyOptions.Roots equals nil and the installation is on Windows). Thus,X.509 certificate verification is incomplete.

criterions.comment: golang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
